In Julia, Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

function pig_latinify(words)
    nthreads = Threads.nthreads()
    tasks = [@spawn pig_latin_single(word) for word in words]
    pig_latin_words = fetch.(@async for task in tasks)
    return pig_latin_words
end

pig_latinify(["apple", "banana", "cherry"])

function pig_latin_single(word)
    # Remove punctuation
    word = replace(word, r"[^\w\s]" => "")

    # Separate the first letter from the rest of the word
    first_letter = word[1]
    rest = word[2:end]

    # Create the pig latin version
    pig_latin = rest * first_letter * "ay"

    return pig_latin
end
